page.title: 14THE TIMBER MILL
page.content:
{The Mill}is about half a mile from our school. The mill was built in {1900.}Inside the house there are four rooms two upstairs ,two downstairs. The ones upstairs were never used because they were too small. The beds were downstairs in the living room. Inside the house was cold because a fire was never put on. {Eight people}lived in the house. Their names were Margraret,Charlie, Irene,Nancy,Robin,Carol,Olive and Gloria.Six of them were born in the mill house.Irene was 10 when she left.They all went to the{Old Gate {school. The mill itself was used for{cutting {timber.}There was a{corn thrasher beside the house, it was used for {grinding grain.
_
